sic-sp-no-access: You have no access to this page.
sic-sp-display-count: showing comments $1 through $2 (out of $3 in total)
sic-sp-adminbutton-confirm: Are you sure you want to perform this action?
sic-sp-adminbutton-block-comments-toolti: Block viewing and adding new comments
sic-sp-adminbutton-unblock-comments-tool: Allow viewing and adding new comments
sic-popup-msg-single: We found #X# comment in the current revision of this page. You can view it by enabling the comment mode.
sic-popup-msg-multiple: We found #X# comments in the current revision of this page. You can view them by enabling the comment mode.
sic-popup-enabled-highlighting-msg: Make a text selection to create a comment
sic-popup-unlocalized-comments-msg: There are comments of which the original location cannot be determined. They have been added at the bottom of the page.
sic-unlocalized-comments-found: Comments that are no longer attached to a text selection on this page:
sic-unlocalized-comment: Previous selected text that has been deleted.
sic-props-description: This special property was added by the SmartComments extension.
right-add-inlinecomments: Add comments to wiki pages and reply to comments
right-manage-inlinecomments: Delete comments from wiki pages or change status
apihelp-smartcomments-description: API for adding and managing inline comments
apihelp-smartcomments-param-user: Id of the author of the comment
apihelp-smartcomments-param-page: Name of the page to which the comment is to be added
apihelp-smartcomments-param-rev: Id of the revision to which the comment applies
apihelp-smartcomments-param-pos: Position of the comment on the page
apihelp-smartcomments-param-parent: Id of the comment to which the reply applies
apihelp-smartcomments-param-status: Status of the comment, for filtering or managing comments
sic-selection-error-2: Selection contains a dynamic block. Click the block instead of selecting it.
sic-selection-error-3: Selection contains line breaks, try to limit your selection to just a piece of text.
sic-selection-error-4: Selection contains HTML code, try to limit your selection to just a piece of text.
sic-added-comment-refreshing: Please wait while the page is refreshing...
